mapper.select: select ifnull(tp.account,tc.account) as account , ifnull(tp.avatar,tc.avatar)as avatar, ifnull(tp.name,tc.com_name)as name, ifnull(tp.phone,tc.con_phone) as phone, tp.sex as sex, tp.age as age, tp.company as company, tp.post as post, ta.sign_state as singState from tb_activity_apply ta left join tb_user_person tp on ta.account = tp.account left join tb_user_company tc on tc.account = ta.account where 1=1 and ta.activity_id=#{activityId}
